CustomField.description: Display which Complaint Types have been chosen on the record. Whether None, Some or All.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Complaint_Type_Number__c , 0, "General", 1, "Manufacturing Fault Present", 10, "Legal", 100, "Injury", 11, "Manufacturing Fault Present and Legal", 101, "Manufacturing Fault Present and Injury", 110, "Legal and Injury", 111, "Manufacturing Fault Present, Legal and Injury", NULL)
CustomField.label: Complaint Type
